summary:
Reconext is a global leader in IT Asset Disposition (ITAD) and electronics lifecycle services, founded in 1983. The company operates a worldwide network of facilities to help technology companies, OEMs, telecom operators, and retailers securely and sustainably manage the post-sale lifecycle of electronic devices. Their core services include returns management, testing and grading, repair and refurbishment, asset recovery, and trade-in programs, all designed to extend product life, recover value, and reduce e-waste.

The company distinguishes itself through significant in-house engineering and R&D, developing proprietary automation and testing platforms like Optiline (AI cosmetic grading), Titan (CPE testing), Proteus (storage testing/erasure), and Rackwipe (data center erasure). With major facilities across the U.S., Mexico, Europe, and Asia, Reconext processes millions of devices annually, adhering to high standards of data security, operational excellence, and environmental responsibility. Their mission is to enable 100% reuse of materials, transforming returned electronics into valuable assets for redeployment, remarketing, or responsible recycling.
